author: jdcasey
msg: [MASSEMBLY-278] Adding parameter ignoreMissingDescriptor (default value: false) to allow reuse of a single assembly configuration throughout a multimodule build, without failing on submodules that don't contain the assembly descriptor referenced by the configuration...instead, simply don't run for these cases.
NOTE: I added two unit tests to DefaultAssemblyReaderTest to test this new functionality.

author: djd
msg: DERBY-1378 DERBY-3424 Hide the implementation class for Derby's MBeans from JMX clients and add more information to the javadoc under org.apache.derby.mbeans
